entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023
